reasons: Prediction 0 and prediction 2 are almost the same, but prediction 0 has no repetitions; Prediction 1 has some more unrelated lines and repetitions
output:
I don't know who or what you are, but I don't care.
Well, you love this boy.
You have plans for him.
Hopes and dreams.
Although the boy will not die here,
for a thousand years his dearest wish will be that he had,
for God's sake,
do I look like someone who cares what God thinks?
